reference.title: (FoundryMonitor) Foundry Networks Devices
reference.shortdesc: The ZenPacks.zenoss.FoundryMonitor ZenPack monitors networking devices built by Foundry Networks (now Brocade Communication Systems).

section.note: This ZenPack is not installed when is installed. To download it, visit .
section.p: This ZenPack models specific details on Foundry devices, including:
This ZenPack monitors memory utilization, as well as CPU utilization averages for 1 minute, 1 second, and 5 seconds.
It also includes all Foundry traps to ensure proper decoding of those traps through zentrap.
